project.name: advanced-example
project.description:
Advanced example and integration test for the maven-smartmodules-extension.
Contains a multi-module build tree with several levels of descendant modules, and some edge cases like:
- inter-module dependencies (to assert we didn't break the reactor's project sorting capabilities), - build order assumptions,
- some POM inheritance between modules (to verify that properties and other things are correctly passed to descendant projects amd project sorting),
- some predefined modules (to make sure that auto-detected modules are merged with explictly declared modules.
